short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save The Tabs - Save and restore all open tabs from the toolbar popup!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Save The Tabs" is a browser add-on that allows you to save and shut all tabs with a single click from your browser's toolbar

To remove a tab, simply open the toolbar popup UI and click on the - Close tabs - button on the top-left corner. Please click on the Open tabs - button on the top toolbar to re-open all closed tabs. Within the toolbar popup UI, you will see a list of tabs as well as a list of opened tabs (drag & drop). The items in this list may be easily rearranged (drag & drop). All existing open tabs will be automatically resized to match your new order.

Aside from that, you may click on the close button in the toolbar pop-up to close a single tab (and remove it from the list). The precise change will be shown for all open tabs in your browser when you make any modifications in the toolbar popup UI; vice versa, once you alter any settings on the open tabs, the toolbar popup will reflect these changes.
